title: January Jobs Hit 200,000, iPhoneX Super Cycle Dead, Street View on Tech Earnings
itunes:title: January Jobs Hit 200,000, iPhoneX Super Cycle Dead, Street View on Tech Earnings
description:
Chris Lu, Former Deputy Secretary of Labor, discusses the “positive” January jobs report. Alistair Barr, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter and Bob O'Donnell, President at Technalysis Research, break down why the iPhone “super cycle” has been pronounced dead on arrival. Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his "Chart of the Day." Bloomberg Markets Reporter Taylor Riggs discuss how Wall Street is digesting tech earnings. We Drive to the Close with Jeff Carbone, Managing Partner at Cornerstone Financial. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” and Dave Wilson is back with the “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
